regen.absent_element: calls connect to the handset when off the hook
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the handset when it is off the hook.

regen.absent_element: notification for call redirection when handset off the hook
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the driver when a call is redirected to the handset as it is picked up, ensuring clarity on call status.

regen.absent_element: the connection of calls to the handset when off the hook
regen.new_specification: Calls shall automatically be connected to the handset if it is off the hook.

label: be connected to the handset if the handset is off hook.
absence: situation of the handset is off hook
